title: A Feast of Fools
description:
We know it’s dark and scary out there right now in these uncertain times. We hope you’re staying safe and staying quarantined. We’re grateful to have you here with us for a little escape. Come closer and listen to strange happenings beyond your wildest imaginations in this feast of fools. First a dark water legend rises to the surface. Next, we investigate the hot buzz at a college campus. After that, there’s ‘a knock at the window’ in a classic creepy pasta. And finally, a twisted retelling of the Monkey’s Paw.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Studio71
